function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of adherence to safety steps before shifts start","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak","Mitigation":"Implement strict protocols for pre-shift safety checks and health screenings","Technologies":"Health screening tools, digital check-in systems","People":"Construction workers, site managers","Owner":"Construction site management"},{"Description":"Lack of job site hygiene","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak, potential contamination of construction materials","Mitigation":"Enforce strict sanitation and hygiene protocols on the job site","Technologies":"Sanitization stations, hygiene signage, disinfection tools","People":"Construction workers, site supervisors, subcontractors","Owner":"Construction site management"},{"Description":"Inadequate social distancing at the job site","Impact":"Higher risk of close contact transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement and enforce social distancing protocols, reconfigure work areas for distancing","Technologies":"Digital monitoring systems, contact tracing apps","People":"Construction workers, site supervisors, subcontractors","Owner":"Construction site management"}]}
